summary: Platform component accessed by non-Red Hat SRE user
description: A user on your system has accessed or modified a platform component, ${COMPONENT}, which is the responsibility of Red Hat SRE. Tampering with platform components can endanger SLAs. Please refer to https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/openshift_dedicated/4/html/introduction_to_openshift_dedicated/policies-and-service-definition#policy-responsibility-matrix.
